summary: Implements low‑level GEOS I/O primitives that translate between Django geometry objects and the standard Well‑Known Binary (WKB) and Well‑Known Text (WKT) representations, offering configurable handling of byte order, dimensionality, SRID and output formatting.
business_intent: Support Django’s geographic information system features by providing reliable serialization and deserialization of spatial data for storage, exchange, and interoperability with databases and external GIS services.
